attributes.action: Have a "No one" column in voting ballot paper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,
As we all know that the voting turnover is just under 33% of the UK population who are eligible to vote. In my opinion majority of the people not voting is because they dont believe that anyone is worthy of having their vote. It will be good idea to always have a column called "No One" in all the ballot papers, so atleast we can see the true turnover and will give idea of how much of the UK is prepared to vote only if there was someone who really mattered to the public!

Hope my request is taken under consideration.

regards,
M Ali Syed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
